ocean.question: I swim in the sea, and I go 'glub glub'! What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have fins and a tail.
🌊 I live in the water.
🐡 Some of my friends are colorful!

ocean.question: I’m big and blue, and boats float on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ Boats like to sail on me.
💧 I'm made of water.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, and I walk very slowly on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I like to hide in my shell.
🏖️ I can be found near the ocean.
🥬 I love to eat green things.

ocean.question: I can be found on the beach, and you can build castles with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You can scoop me up.
🏖️ I'm near the ocean.
🏰 I'm great for building!

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
💧 I squirt ink to get away.
🌊 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I’m a big animal that lives in the ocean, and I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very, very big.
🎶 I make a special sound to talk.
💧I breathe air like you.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the beach and have big claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I pinch with my claws.
🚶 I move in a funny way.
🌊 I can live in the ocean and on land.

ocean.question: I am a star that lives in the sea! What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms that point out like a star.
🖐️ I might have five arms!
🌊 I live at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am long and thin and look like a snake but I swim in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I wiggle through the water.
🌱 I look like a plant but I am an animal
🌊 I like to hide in seaweed.

ocean.question: I have a pouch where I carry my babies, and I swim upright. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I am a kind of horse that lives in the sea.
👶 My daddy carries the eggs!
🌊 I am very small and colorful.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I am small and furry.

animal.question: I say 'Woof! Woof!' Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🐕 I wag my tail when I'm happy.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in the field.
🥛 My milk is yummy in your cereal.
🐄 I am a big farm animal.

animal.question: I say 'Quack!' and swim in the pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🩱 I like to swim.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🐤 I have webbed feet and a beak.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and grey.
🚿 I can spray water from my nose.

animal.question: I love to swing from trees and eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I make funny faces.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I peel my own snacks!

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide in the grass.
🐎 I look like a horse, but with stripes.
🌍 You can find me in Africa.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I reach the highest leaves.
🦒 I have a spotty coat.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I roar very loudly and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 Everyone listens when I speak
🦁 I have a big mane around my head.
🐾 I am a strong cat.

animal.question: I’m big and green, and live in the water. I have a big mouth and sharp teeth. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I like to swim.
☀️ I like to lay in the sun
🦷 Be careful of my bite!
